pages.text: /* 全局变量 */ :root { --color-site-body: #f4f4f4; --color-site-bg: #f4f4f4; --backurl: url(https://macjpeg.mac89.com/macw/pic/202204/26164729_1faeec3fd3.jpeg) } /* 全局鼠标手势 */ .cursor{ cursor: pointer; } [data-theme='dark']{ --color-site-body: var(--global-bg); --color-site-bg: var(--global-bg); --backurl: url(https://macjpeg.mac89.com/macw/pic/202204/26164730_e164050cb9.jpeg) } /* 引入HarmonyOS_Sans 字体 */ @font-face{ font-family:HarmonyOS_Sans_SC_Medium; font-style:normal; font-display:swap; src: url(../../font/HarmonyOS_Sans_SC_Medium.subset.woff2) format('woff2') } body{ font-family:HarmonyOS_Sans_SC_Medium ,-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', Lato, Roboto, 'PingFang SC', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; } /* 修改导航 */ #page-header #menus { flex: 1; justify-content: center; display: flex; width: 100%; margin-left: -100px; } #page-header #blog_name { width: 100px; flex: none !important; position: relative; } #nav .site-page:not(.child):after { height: 30px; left: -5px; right: -5px; width: auto; border-radius: 4px; opacity: 0; } #nav .site-page:hover:after { opacity: 1; width: auto !important; } #page-header.not-top-img #nav a:hover { color: #fff; } /* 底部文字 */ #footer { background: transparent; } #footer-wrap { color: var(--hl-color); } /* 调节亮暗模式按钮 */ .sidebar-icon { color: var(--font-color); } /* nav模糊背景 */ #nav { backdrop-filter: saturate(180%) blur(20px); } /* 去除卡片box-shadow */ .cardHover, .layout > div:first-child:not(.recent-posts), #recent-posts > .recent-post-item, #aside-content .card-widget, .layout > .recent-posts .pagination > *:not(.space){ box-shadow: none; } /* 归档选中 */ #aside-content .card-archives ul.card-archive-list > .card-archive-list-item a, #aside-content .card-categories ul.card-category-list > .card-category-list-item a{ border-radius: 4px; } /* 头像hover */ .avatar-img img:hover{ transform: scale(1.2); } /* 时间轴 */ /* .article-sort-item.year{ font-size: 1.43em; position: relative; width: 100%; background: var(--card-bg); margin-left: -45px; margin-bottom: 10px; } .article-sort-item.year::before{ display: none; } .article-sort-item-info{ display: flex; align-items: center; } .article-sort-item-time{ margin-right: 20px; min-width: 95px; } .article-sort-item-title{ flex: 1; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; word-break: break-all; } .article-sort-item-title:hover,.article-sort-item:hover .article-sort-item-time{ color: var(--btn-hover-color); } .article-sort-item.no-article-cover{ height: auto; margin-bottom: 20px; } .article-sort-title{ display: none; } */ /* 时间轴分页 */ #pagination .pagination{ text-align: right; } #pagination .page-number{ text-align: center; border-radius: 4px; } #pagination .extend{ padding: 4px; border-radius: 4px; max-width: 24px; max-height: 24px; } #pagination .page-number:hover,#pagination .extend:hover{ color: var(--btn-color); background-color: var(--btn-hover-color); /* border-radius: 4px; */ } /* 侧边栏item */ #aside-content .card-webinfo .webinfo .webinfo-item .item-name{ min-width: 112px; } #aside-content .card-webinfo .webinfo .webinfo-item .item-count{ overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; width: 100%; text-align: right; } /* 目录样式 */ #card-toc span.toc-link { filter: blur(2px); } #card-toc .toc-number{ display: none; } #aside-content #card-toc .toc-content .toc-link.active{ filter: blur(0px); background: none; color: var(--btn-hover-color); font-size: 16px; } #card-toc .toc-link span.toc-text { filter: blur(1px); transition: filter .3s ease-in-out; } #card-toc .toc-link.active span.toc-text {filter: blur(0px);} #card-toc .toc:hover .toc-link span.toc-text { filter: blur(0px); } /* 滚动条 */ body{ margin: 0; overflow: overlay; } ::-webkit-scrollbar{ background-color: transparent; width: 12px; } ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.5); border-radius: 8px; background-clip: content-box; border: 2px solid transparent; transition: background-color .3s ; } ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{ background-color: var(--btn-hover-color); } /* 头像 */ .avatar-img{ width: auto; height: auto; margin: -20px -24px; border-radius: 0; margin-bottom: 0; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px){ .avatar-img{ width: 110px; height: 110px; margin: 0 auto; border-radius: 50%; } } /* 搜索结果 */ #local-search-results{ padding-top: 20px; } #search-mask { backdrop-filter: blur(12px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); } #local-search .search-dialog .local-search-box input{ padding: 10px 14px; border-radius: 8px; } /* nav右侧按钮 */ #right-icons{ display: flex; align-items: center; } #right-icons>div{ margin-left: 10px; padding: 0 !important } /* 全局卡片 */ #sidebar-menus,.cardHover, .layout > div:first-child:not(.recent-posts), #recent-posts > .recent-post-item, #aside-content .card-widget, .layout > .recent-posts .pagination > *:not(.space){ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); backdrop-filter: blur(11.5px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(11.5px); border: 0px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18); box-shadow: rgba(142, 142, 142, 0.19) 0px 6px 15px 0px; -webkit-box-shadow: rgba(142, 142, 142, 0.19) 0px 6px 15px 0px; border-radius: 11px; -webkit-border-radius: 11px; } /* 背景 */ #web_bg{ position: fixed; z-index: -999; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: var( --backurl); background-attachment: local; background-position: center; background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; transition: background-image .5s; } #web_bg::before{ position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; content: ''; } [data-theme='light'] #web_bg:before{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); } [data-theme='dark'] #web_bg:before{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); } [data-theme='dark'] #footer:before, [data-theme='dark'] #page-header:before{ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0); } [data-theme='dark'] #page-header.nav-fixed > #nav, [data-theme='dark'] #page-header.not-top-img > #nav{ background: rgb(18 18 18 / 61%); } #page-header.not-top-img #nav{ background: rgba(255,255,255,0.6); } #footer::before,#page-header:before{ display: none; } /* 归档列表 */ .article-sort-item-img{ width: 160px; height: 80px; border-radius: 8px; } .article-sort-item-title{ font-size: 1.4em; line-height: 2em; } .post-meta-categories{ margin-right: 15px; } .article-sort{ margin:0; padding: 0; border: 0; } .article-sort-item:before,.article-sort-title:after,.article-sort-title:before{ display: none; } .layout#content-inner{ max-width: 1500px; padding: 40px 36px; } /* 右侧分类 */ .card-category-list-item { display: flex; } /* 右侧归档 */ #aside-content .card-archives ul.card-archive-list>.card-archive-list-item a, #aside-content .card-categories ul.card-category-list>.card-category-list-item a{ border-radius: 4px; margin: 4px 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-content: space-between; border:1px solid #ddd } #aside-content .card-archives ul.card-archive-list>.card-archive-list-item a span:first-child, #aside-content .card-categories ul.card-category-list>.card-category-list-item a span:first-child{ width: auto; flex: none; } .card-archive-list-count-group{ display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: baseline; } span.card-archive-list-count{ width: auto; text-align: left; font-size: 1.1rem; line-height: .9; font-weight: 700; } .card-archive-list-count-unit{ width: auto; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; } .card-archive-list-date { font-size: 14px; opacity: .6 } li.card-archive-list-item { width: 100%; flex: 0 0 48% } #aside-content .card-archives ul.card-archive-list, #aside-content .card-categories ul.card-category-list{ display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-between; flex-wrap: wrap; } #aside-content .item-headline+div, #aside-content .item-headline+ul{ padding: 0; } /*归档选中 */ #aside-content .card-archives ul.card-archive-list > .card-archive-list-item a:hover, #aside-content .card-categories ul.card-category-list > .card-category-list-item a:hover,#sidebar #sidebar-menus .menus_items .site-page:hover{ color: var(--btn-color); background-color: var(--btn-hover-color); border-radius: 4px; padding: 3px 10px; border-color: var(--btn-hover-color); }

(function () { // let nav = document.getElementById("nav"); // let sidebar = document.createElement("DIV"); // sidebar.className = "sidebar-icon"; // sidebar.innerHTML = ''; let html = document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0]; let darkmodeCopy = document.getElementById('darkmodeCopy') darkmodeCopy.onclick = function () { let dataTheme = html.getAttribute("data-theme"); let sidebarFlag = dataTheme === "dark" ? "light" : "dark"; html.setAttribute("data-theme", sidebarFlag); saveToLocal.set("theme", sidebarFlag, 2); }; // nav.appendChild(sidebar); })();

posts.title: 使用Jenkins部署Hexo博客项目
posts.text: 将本地博客源码上传到GitHub创建任务新建Jenkins 名称为blog的Freestyle project 任务 点击确定创建 添加完凭证之后 报错 显示是链接远程库错误，状态码128 ，身份验证失败 远程：2021 8月13日取消了对密码验证的支持 远程：请查看https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/getting-started-with-git/about-remote-repositories#cloning-with-https-urls获取有关当前推荐的身份验证模式的信息。 打开链接

posts.title: 替换博客字体为HarmonyOS_Sans 字体
posts.text: 下载字体文件HarmonyOS_Sans 替换字体1234@font-face{font-family:HarmonyOS_Sans_SC_Medium;font-style:normal;font-display:swap;src:url(输入文件的链接) format('woff2')}*{font-family:HarmonyOS_Sans_SC_Medium}body {font-family: HarmonyOS!important;} 文件的链接为刚才下载的文件

posts.title: jenkins 构建时选择分支
posts.text: 安装Git ParameterJenkins选择分支需要安装 Git Parameter 插件 配置 安装完毕之后在打开当前工程的配置选项 然后找到General，选中This project is parameterized 点击添加参数按钮，选择 Git Parameter 输入名称变量为branch，输入描述，参数类型选择分支或标签，默认值可以填写自己默认的分支 然后切换到源码管理选项，在指定分支处填入刚刚的名称变量 $branch，然后保存即可。 启动，选择分支最后返回到工程，点击build with Paramenters, 就可以选择项目的分支部署啦
